name: anyclaude-lmstudio
description: Run Claude Code with LMStudio local models.

scripts.build: bun build --target node --format cjs --outfile dist/main.cjs ./src/main.ts && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const f='dist/main.cjs';fs.writeFileSync(f,fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8').replace(/import\.meta\.url/g,'__filename'))" && printf '#!/usr/bin/env node\nrequire("./main.cjs");\n' > dist/main.js && chmod +x dist/main.js
scripts.install:global: bun run build && npm pack --silent && npm install -g anyclaude-*.tgz
